name: Almas
description:
• My first Ludum Dare Game-Jam game, I made it in less than 24hrs, I had time limitations.
    It is an Arcade like "rogue" / collector game.

    HOW TO
  • Every time a soul eater or soul grabber gets near you, they will either grab more pieces of your soul or drain you completely.
  • Avoid the soul eaters and soul grabbers until they expire for them to drop pieces of your soul.
